item.title: Gloria add a quote by Arturo Pérez-Reverte
item.description: "Never trust a man who reads only one book." -- Arturo Pérez-Reverte

item.title: Gloria add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Gloria add a quote by Natalie Babbitt
item.description: "Like all magnificent things, it's very simple." -- Natalie Babbitt

item.title: Gloria add a quote by Søren Kierkegaard
item.description: "Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards." -- Søren Kierkegaard

item.title: Gloria add a quote by Henry Ward Beecherr
item.description: "Where is human nature so weak as in the bookstore?" -- Henry Ward Beecherr

item.title: Gloria add a quote by Edgar Degas
item.description: "Only when he no longer knows what he is doing does the painter do good things." -- Edgar Degas

item.title: Gloria add a quote by Niels Bohr
item.description: "An expert is a person who has made all the mistakes that can be made in a very narrow field." -- Niels Bohr

item.title: Gloria add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "Why, sometimes I've believed as many as six impossible things before breakfast." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Gloria add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Happiness consists in getting enough sleep. Just that, nothing more." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Gloria add a quote by Gwendolyn Brooks
item.description: "Live not for Battles Won. Live not for The-End-of-the-Song. Live in the along." -- Gwendolyn Brooks

item.title: Gloria add a quote by E.L. Doctorow
item.description: "Writing is a socially acceptable form of schizophrenia." -- E.L. Doctorow

item.title: Gloria add a quote by Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach
item.description: "To be content with little is difficult; to be content with much, impossible." -- Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach

item.title: Gloria add a quote by Ursula K. Le Guin
item.description: "People who deny the existence of dragons are often eaten by dragons. From within." -- Ursula K. Le Guin

item.title: Gloria add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "Of course motivation is not permanent. But then, neither is bathing; but it is something you should do on a regular basis." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Gloria add a quote by Edward Albee
item.description: "You're alive only once, as far as we know, and what could be worse than getting to the end of your life and realizing you hadn't lived it?" -- Edward Albee

item.title: Gloria add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "Life has no meaning. Each of us has meaning and we bring it to life. It is a waste to be asking the question when you are the answer." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Gloria add a quote by Eudora Welty
item.description: "All serious daring starts from within." -- Eudora Welty

item.title: Gloria add a quote by Richard P. Feynman
item.description: "Nobody ever figures out what life is all about, and it doesn't matter. Explore the world. Nearly everything is really interesting if you go into it deeply enough." -- Richard P. Feynman

item.title: Gloria add a quote by Edith Wharton
item.description: "My little old dog a heart-beat at my feet" -- Edith Wharton

item.title: Gloria add a quote by Mary Oliver
item.description: "Someone I loved once gave me a box full of darkness. It took me years to understand that this too, was a gift." -- Mary Oliver

item.title: Gloria add a quote by A.J. Cronin
item.description: "Worry never robs tomorrow of its sorrow, but only saps today of its strength." -- A.J. Cronin

item.title: Gloria add a quote by Christopher Paolini
item.description: "Books should go where they will be most appreciated, and not sit unread, gathering dust on a forgotten shelf, don't you agree?" -- Christopher Paolini

item.title: Gloria add a quote by Bill Nye
item.description: "Everyone you will ever meet knows something you don't." -- Bill Nye

item.title: Gloria add a quote by Ashleigh Brilliant
item.description: "My life has a superb cast, but I cannot figure out the plot." -- Ashleigh Brilliant

item.title: Gloria add a quote by Selma Lagerlöf
item.description: "Nothing on earth can make up for the loss of one who has loved you." -- Selma Lagerlöf

item.title: Gloria add a quote by Gustave Flaubert
item.description: "Be steady and well-ordered in your life so that you can be fierce and original in your work." -- Gustave Flaubert

item.title: Gloria add a quote by Stephen Hawking
item.description: "We are just an advanced breed of monkeys on a minor planet of a very average star. But we can understand the Universe. That makes us something very special." -- Stephen Hawking

item.title: Gloria add a quote by Nicholson Baker
item.description: "I woke up thinking a very pleasant thought. There is lots left in the world to read." -- Nicholson Baker

item.title: Gloria add a quote by Eddie Huang
item.description: "I think my mom is manic, but Chinese people don't believe in psychologists. We just drink more tea when things go bad. Sometimes I agree; I think we're all over diagnosed." -- Eddie Huang

item.title: Gloria add a quote by James A. Baldwin
item.description: "Love does not begin and end the way we seem to think it does. Love is a battle, love is a war; love is a growing up." -- James A. Baldwin
